    • Uses of CredentialsProvider in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials

      Subinterfaces of CredentialsProvider in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  InitializableCredentialsProvider
      Extended contract for credentials providers that require initialization with configuration from AWS Secrets Manager.
      Classes in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials that implement CredentialsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultCredentialsProvider
      Encapsulates RDS secrets deserialization.
      class  OAuthCredentialsProvider
      Base class for OAuth credential providers.
      class  StaticCredentialsProvider
      Static credential provider.
      Methods in com.amazonaws.athena.connector.credentials that return CredentialsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static CredentialsProvider CredentialsProviderFactory.createCredentialProvider​(String secretName, CachableSecretsManager secretsManager, InitializableCredentialsProvider provider)
      Creates a credentials provider based on the secret configuration.
